EmailTemplate.subject: The NEW Customer Portal is launching tomorrow, providing complete access with SSO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
April 26, 2016
We are launching the NEW Customer Portal on April 26, 2016. The migration window is scheduled for 3 hours (10:00 am-1:00 pm PDT). During this time, please submit customer tickets through Zendesk or email to customer-service@pivotal.io <[[mailto:customer-service@pivotal.io]]>.
Valued Pivotal Ticket Agents and End-Users,
The Global Support Services (GSS) at Pivotal is excited to announce that our Customer Portal is launching on April 26, 2016. The new Portal will provide advanced operational excellence to our customers and partners along with many user- friendly features. With the new Portal, we have enhanced Single Sign On (SSO), Support Entitlements, Ticket Management, User Management and Knowledge Base Access. You will also be able to perform the following functions from a single (SSO-enabled) landing page for a more streamlined experience:
- Access Pivotal Network to download software - Search our improved Knowledge Base for self-help solutions - View & download documentation - Learn about Pivotal's support offerings & policies
What happens next?
Once the new Portal is launched:
- For Pivotal Ticket Agents: continue to sign in Zendesk with your Google authentication through https://discuss.zendesk.com/agent <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/agent]]> or to access other pages through support.pivotal.io <[[mailto:support.pivotal.io]]> - For Pivotal End-Users: sign in to the new Portal with your existing credentials, follow instructions and set a new password through support.pivotal.io <[[support.pivotal.io]]>
Have questions about your new Customer Portal?
Check out our FAQs <[[https://support.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/218921867]]>, Training slides <[[https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/gss-pivotal-academy/support-portal.pdf]]> and Video <[[https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/gss-pivotal-academy/support-portal5.mp4]]> for a quick tour on the new Portal. If you would like any further information, please email us at ops-support@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ops-support@pivotal.io]]>, highlight the subject [New Customer Portal] so that we can route the ticket effectively.
Sincerely,
Your Pivotal GSS Team
